title: Squaring i
text: If $$i^2=-1$$, what will $$-6i-12i^2$$ be when we simplify i?
speech: If  i squared is equal to negative 1 , what will  negative 6 i minus 12 i squared  be when we simplify i?

, what will   negative 6 i minus 12 i squared

title: Solution
text: What will our final expression be after simplifying?
